title: Ith, High Arcanist
text: Vigilance: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.Suspend 4— (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay  and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
